titles.title: Ensuring Continuous Medicaid Coverage for Children Act of 2009
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require 12-month continuous coverage for children under Medicaid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 6/10/2009--Introduced. Ensuring Continuous Medicaid Coverage for Children Act of 2009 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to change from discretionary to mandatory the authority of state Medicaid plans to provide for 12-month continuous coverage of children under Medicaid.
